requirements.summary: Restore the frontend application to the state it was in at version 17, reverting all changes made after that version
acceptanceCriteria: The deployed application matches the behavior and appearance of version 17.
All frontend changes introduced after version 17 are reverted.
The app builds and deploys without errors.

file_operations.description: Restore the main App router configuration to match version 17, removing any routes or functionality added after that version.
Restore the HomePage component to its version 17 state, reverting any layout, content, or functionality changes made subsequently.
Restore the ServicesPage to version 17, ensuring service display and lead capture functionality matches the original implementation.
Restore the BookingPage to version 17 state, reverting any form changes, validation logic, or UI modifications made after that version.
Restore the booking confirmation page to its version 17 implementation.
Restore the main Layout component to version 17, ensuring navigation, header, and footer match the original design and functionality.
Restore the ServiceCategoryCard component to version 17 state, reverting any styling or interaction changes.
Restore the LeadCaptureModal to its version 17 implementation, ensuring form fields and submission logic match the original.
Restore the PortfolioGallery component to version 17, reverting any layout or lightbox functionality changes.
Restore the LoginButton component to version 17 state, ensuring authentication flow matches the original implementation.
Restore the ProfileSetupModal to version 17, reverting any form or validation changes.
Restore the ProtectedRoute guard component to its version 17 implementation.
Restore all React Query hooks to their version 17 state, ensuring backend interaction logic matches the original implementation.
Restore global CSS and design tokens to version 17, reverting any theme or styling changes made after that version.
Restore Tailwind configuration to version 17 state, ensuring color schemes, fonts, and utility classes match the original setup.
Restore the main HTML entry point to version 17, reverting any meta tags, scripts, or structural changes.
Remove the admin portal HTML entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin portal React entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminApp router if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin login page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin bookings management page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLayout component if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminProtectedRoute guard if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin leads HTML entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin leads React entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLeadsApp router if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin leads dashboard page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the admin leads login page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLeadsLayout component if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLeadsProtectedRoute guard if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLeadsTable component if it was added after version 17.
Remove the AdminLeadsManagementTable component if it was added after version 17.
Remove the employee portal HTML entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the employee portal React entry point if it was added after version 17.
Remove the EmployeeApp router if it was added after version 17.
Remove the employee dashboard page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the employee login page if it was added after version 17.
Remove the EmployeeLayout component if it was added after version 17.
